org.jetel.data.primitive

Class NumericFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.text.Format
      • java.text.NumberFormat
        • org.jetel.data.primitive.NumericFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class NumericFormat
extends java.text.NumberFormat
    This class is equivalent of DecimalFormat for BigDecimal /**
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
